entry.title: Red Wine Tea - Tin Can
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 6.91

Blending the natural essence of red wine with premium black tea, Red Wine Tea offers a distinctive and refined taste experience. Fruity and floral notes intertwine with earthy undertones, while hibiscus petals contribute a smooth, rounded flavor profile.

Versatile and aromatic, this tea can be enjoyed hot or cold - making it a sophisticated choice for elegant gatherings or a moment of indulgence.

entry.title: Spring Moonlight Mystique Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 12.64 - 488.99 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Well-rolled dark green leaves & silver tips with several open green leaves.
Tea Colour:
Very Pale Golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly light green leaves with few coppery corners and a prominent nose.
Selectively harvested 2024 Spring Moonlight tea from the renowned & scenic Thurbo estate in Darjeeling. This rare plucking has a soft, sweet and a very pleasant taste. Extremely mellow, delightfully floral and amazingly smooth - these are characteristics of this tea which sets it apart from most others this season

Tea Infusion:

New season 2025 organic prime spring tea from the Okayti estate in Darjeeling. Mildly sweetish, fruity and flavoury - this is a choice tea that can be relished by itself or with light savouries.

New season 2025 organic spring tea from the Avongrove estate in Darjeeling. This tea has a prominent fruitiness that comes with the distinct clonal flavour and brews a cuppa that can be relished.

entry.title: Spring Waft Terai Black Tea First Flush 2025

Dry Leaf:
Greenish / greyish rolled leaves with few silver tips
Tea Colour:

Green leaves with coppery corners
Fresh new season 2025 Spring Tea from Terai in the foothills of the Himalayas. This early pick from the area comes with a smooth, slightly floral and mildly vegetal taste that is pleasantly aromatic. The finer soughts from this area are harvested only during this season with a short window.

New Spring Tea 2024 from the scenic Puttabong estate in Darjeeling. The wholesome & pleasant favour combines with the soft & pleasant floral aroma to brew a distinct and soothing drinking experience.

Fine Darjeeling new season 2025 early flushing tae from the Giddapahar estate. A pleasantly fragrant and fruity variety of the Clonal kind that tastes smooth along with a pleasant floral aroma that makes it a drinking pleasure. This tea is best relished by itself.

entry.title: Darjeeling Full Leaf Pyramid - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Teas India
Type: Black Tea
Price: 18.00

A rare & enchanting selection of the finest tea leaves from the foothill of the Himalayas. This premium Darjeeling is characterized by a sparkling amber color, flowery aroma and a smooth flavor with distinct fruity notes. Much sought after by connoisseurs worldwide.
Each Pyramid Teabag Contains 2 grams of Tea.

entry.title: Spring Ardour Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: Black Tea
Price: 2.01 - 77.94 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Dark green rolled leaves with few green open leaves & several silvery buds.
Tea Colour:
Pale Golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly green leaves with few coppery ends and a soft nose.
Very early 2025 Spring plucking from the Upper Fagu Estate in Darjeeling. The flavour profile is fairly pronounced & smooth with slight vegetal & fruity notes. The soft floral aroma adds to the character of this new First Flush Tea.

entry.title: Spring Magnificence Star Darjeeling Black Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 18.87 - 730.20 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly silver tips with just a few other leaves.
Tea Colour:
Pale Yellow
Tea Infusion:
Light green leaves & bud sets with a few coppery hues and a soft & pleasant floral nose.
New 2025 very early Spring Tea from the upper division of the Namring estate in Darjeeling. The extra cautiously selected soft tender buds, plucked & processed by experienced pluckers with minimum machining, have a light, aromatic & gentle feel. The flavour profile of this very special tea is extraordinarily mellowed, mild & pleasantly sweet. The soft floral aroma further enhances the qualitative superiority of this most fascinating offering. One of the most outstanding teas of the season.

entry.title: Snow White Buds Darjeeling White Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: White Tea
Price: 8.44 - 326.54 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly greenish leaf & bud silver tips
Tea Colour:
Very pale yellow
Tea Infusion:
Light green leaf & bud sets with a very soft & pleasant nose.
New season 2025 fresh & select harvest from the scenic Tukvar tea estate in Darjeeling. This delicately-plucked and minimally processed offering comes with flavour a profile that is remarkably smooth, delicately fruity and has a fine finish that is par excellence. The added pleasant aroma makes this one of the very fine teas to have been processed this season.

entry.title: White Royale Darjeeling White Tea First Flush 2025
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type: White Tea
Price: 4.13 - 159.99 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Open green leaf & bud sets with ample silvery tipped leaves.
Tea Colour:
Pale yellow
Tea Infusion:
Light green leaves & buds with a soft vegetal nose.
New 2025 very early Spring Tea from the Tukvar estate in Darjeeling. The tender buds are plucked by experienced pluckers and then naturally withered and shade dried without any kind of fermentation or processing. This way the nutrients of the leaves are fully preserved. This minimally processed tea has a highly mellowed & delicate flavour that is very soothing and has mild sweetish notes with gentle floral aroma. The accrual of multiple health benefits is another endearing factor to drink and relish this very fine offering.

entry.title: Aroma Black & Green Tea Assortment Individual Envelope - Tea Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips
Type:
Price: 24.99

Golden Tips Tea was established with a mission to epitomise the art of drinking gourmet teas and an endeavour to make available the luxury of pure & unblended single-origin Indian teas to connoisseurs across the globe. With a commitment to serve only the finest & freshest picks, each tea is selected with precision and packed at source within days of their harvest. Our expert team of tasters & master blenders navigate & assess each tea tasting several hundred cups every week to select those from the prime tea growing season which are destined to bear the Golden Tips stamp. A brand with passion, ethics and a heritage of over 80 years.
 
Mint Green Tea:- Fine Green tea flavoured with mint. 
 
Darjeeling Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea flavoured with citrusy lemon.
 
Jasmine Green Tea:- Fine Green Tea with a mellowed taste.
 
Darjeeling Black Tea:- Bright Colouring Darjeeling summer tea with a pleasant aroma and taste.
 
English Breakfast Tea:- Initially known as Breakfast Tea, English Breakfast.
 
Earl Grey Black Tea:- Bright Colouring black orthodox tea flavoured with the oil of bergamot.

Each Tea contains 5 Teabags

entry.title: Tippy Clonal Gold Organic Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 4.13 - 159.99 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Twirly/wiry black leaves with few brown open leaves with golden tips in abundance.
Tea Color:
Light amber
Tea Infusion:
Bright coppery leaves & buds with a highly fragrant nose.
Prime season Organic Second Flush tea from the well-known & picturesque, Phuguri Estate in Darjeeling. A fine plucking from young bushes, this well known & reputed varietal comes with an elegant, sweetish, fruity flavor that has hints of ripe cherries and is extremely charming to the palate. The prominent clonal notes contribute in making this a most memorable cuppa this season.

entry.title: Flavoury Collection Darjeeling Whole Leaf Teas Gift Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 18.49

Unique assemblage of six different whole-leaf teas from Darjeeling - First Flush, Second Flush, Autumn Flush, Green, White & Oolong. These delightful teas are certain to overwhelm any tea connoisseur. So go ahead and enjoy the finest teas in the world, with this assortment packed in individual tin caddies with illustrations associated with Darjeeling sightseeing spots. Brought to you in a gift box by Golden Tips - India’s oldest & most reputed name in quality teas since 1933.

entry.title: Summer Moonlight Halo Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 6.13 - 237.11 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Dark, quite bold leaves with few brown open leaves and abundantly silver tipped.
Tea Colour:
Bright golden
Tea Infusion:
Coppery leaves & buds with subtle & fragrant nose.
A specially-plucking Tea passionately made from selective tea & bud sets at the highly renowned Margaret's Hope estate situated in the hilly shadows of the Himalayas in Darjeeling. Very subtle, smooth, mildly flavoury with pleasant fruity notes, this is an extremely likeable & classic tea for which Margaret's Hope Moonlights are well known and loved.

entry.title: Moondrop Gold Darjeeling Black Tea Second Flush 2024
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea (India)
Type: Black Tea
Price: 5.03 - 194.69 (5 variants)

Dry Leaf:
Mostly silvery/golden tips with a token presence of black/brown open leaves.
Tea Colour:
Bright golden
Tea Infusion:
Mostly coppery leaves with a striking & flavoury nose.
Prime Second Flush tea from the picturesque and Darjeeling's oldest tea estate - Puttabong. An extremely speciality tea, carefully harvested on sunny days - amidst the seasonal rains - this tea is indeed a visual delight. The unmissable and pleasant aroma, followed by the sharp & rare fruitiness, completely overwhelms the palate and leaves behind a memorable aftertaste. Perhaps, the most unique offering this season.

A special grade of black tea grown only in selected areas of the Darjeeling tea growing distinct at the foothills of the Himalayas. This expertly manufactured offering involves each tea leaf tenderly plucked and masterly processed to create a very fine and flavoury cup of tea.

entry.title: Gift Combos of Masala Chai, Ginger Mastea, Saffron Cardamom Tea, Kadak Chai, Cinnamon CTC Tea & Ginger CTC Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Golden Tips Tea Co. (P) Ltd.
Type: Tea & Infusions
Price: 19.99

A collection of  6 special Indian Spice Teas – Masala Chai, Ginger Mastea, Saffron Cardamom Tea, Kadak Chai, Cinnamon CTC Tea & Earl Grey Masala Tea. Packed in cylindrical golden tin cans with transparent lids and placed in a designer gold-foiled box, most ideal for gifting.
Masala Chai
Ingredients: Green Cardamom, Black Pepper, Cloves, Cinnamon & Black Tea 30g
Ginger Mastea
Ingredients: CTC Tea, Cinnamon, Dry Ginger, Green Cardamom & Cloves 30g
Kadak Chai
Ingredients: Green Cardamom, Cloves, Ginger Cinnamon, Bay Leaves & CTC Tea 30g
Saffron Cardamom Tea
Ingredients: Green Cardamom, Saffron & Black Tea 30g
Cinnamon CTC Tea
Ingredients: Cinnamon & CTC Tea 30g
Ginger CTC Tea
Ingredients: Ginger CTC Tea
